title: Organizations Schemas
description: Auto-generated JSON schemas for organizations models

CourseContentConfig.description: Configuration for course content (assignments, units, etc.).

title.description: Title of the course content (defaults from example if submittable)
title.title: Title

path.description: Hierarchical path using dots (optional; generated when omitted)
path.title: Path

content_type.description: Slug of the course content type (must match a defined content_type)
content_type.title: Content Type

example_identifier.description: Example identifier (e.g., 'week1.fibonacci') - required for submittable content
example_identifier.title: Example Identifier

example_version_tag.description: Version tag of the example (e.g., 'v1.0', 'latest') - defaults to latest
example_version_tag.title: Example Version Tag

execution_backend.description: Override execution backend slug for this content
execution_backend.title: Execution Backend

contents.description: Nested course contents (for units containing assignments)
contents.title: Contents

CourseContentConfig.title: CourseContentConfig

CourseContentTypeConfig.description: Course content type configuration for deployment.

slug.description: Unique identifier for the content type
slug.title: Slug

title.description: Display title for the content type
title.title: Title

color.description: Display color (hex, rgb, hsl, or named color)
color.title: Color

kind.description: ID of the course content kind (e.g., 'assignment', 'unit')
kind.title: Kind

CourseContentTypeConfig.title: CourseContentTypeConfig

ExecutionBackendReference.description: Reference to an execution backend by slug for linking to courses.

slug.description: Slug of the execution backend to link
slug.title: Slug

ExecutionBackendReference.title: ExecutionBackendReference

execution_backends.description: References to execution backends to link to this course (by slug)
execution_backends.title: Execution Backends

content_types.description: Course content types to be created (assignments, units, etc.)
content_types.title: Content Types

HierarchicalCourseFamilyConfig.description: Course family configuration with nested courses.

courses.description: List of courses in this course family
courses.title: Courses

HierarchicalCourseFamilyConfig.title: HierarchicalCourseFamilyConfig

HierarchicalOrganizationConfig.description: Organization configuration with nested course families.

course_families.description: List of course families in this organization
course_families.title: Course Families

HierarchicalOrganizationConfig.title: HierarchicalOrganizationConfig

user_id.description: Associated user ID (for user type organizations)
user_id.title: User Id

OrganizationTaskRequest.description: Request to create an organization via Temporal workflow.
OrganizationTaskRequest.title: OrganizationTaskRequest
